snippet.title: Bash Your Lord Android Gameplay
snippet.description:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/aguploader
*Thank you for your support! Bash Your Lord Gameplay by TFJoy Limited 

Thank you for watching! Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSbdYZ_xPsY5LRNwpSa_3Fg?sub_confirmation=1
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AGUploader
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AndroidGameplayUploader
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/114704273764587601342/

Game Description: 

BASH YOUR LORD IS CARDS GALORE!
Bash Your Lord is no ordinary collectible cards game (CCG). Imagine the best RPG element wrapped up in a card game that requires strategy and a lot of practice to succeed.
In the Kingdom of Zodiac true power lies in your hands. Every card serves a different purpose:
increase your hero defense with armors, deliver devastating blows with gauntlets and curse your opponent for eternity!

FANTASY RPG CARD GAME FOR EVERYONE
❖ More than 30 heroes to unlock, each with their own special powers.
❖ RPG elements to build up your heroes in the Academy in unique ways.
❖ Several modes for you to play, in the single player as well as multiplayer.
❖ Competitive leaderboards to show your glory to the world.

IT REQUIRES RUTHLESS STRATEGY… 
No card is the same. No deck is the same. No fight is the same.
Play a card, enhance it or keep it in your hand: the choice is yours.

…AND MAGIC SKILLS
Enhance the effects of your cards with Rage, which is generated when you receive damage. 
Let your rage be the fuel that moves you forward in your quest to become the strongest of the warlords!

HAVE A LAUGH!
Bash Your Lord is filled with humor and unexpected plot twists. 
The adventure lets you experience both sides of the story, of heroes as well as of villains. 
Bash Your Lord is the perfect card game for beginners to explore, but also a rewarding challenge for veterans of the genre.

Play Store Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cob.bashyourlord

Intro Song: All I Need by Valesco https://soundcloud.com/valesco_official
*The links contain ads, but they'll lead you to the Playstore/Appstore. If you want to support me use this links, if not, you can search google for the download links. Thank you!
#newMobileGames #AndroidGames
Great free games to play right now:
WWE Champions 2021 - https://bstk.me/oyCsYCSeQ
Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire - https://bstk.me/oOb9EnHZC
X-HERO: Idle Avengers - https://bstk.me/uESfLVYlO
AFK Arena - https://bstk.me/qcEKGvrMc
MARVEL Strike Force - Squad RPG - https://bstk.me/rrpoFSvbW
Might & Magic: Era of Chaos - https://bstk.me/mAq8JiEUg
Art of Conquest: Dark Horizon - https://bstk.me/tqkIHsEFy
Battle Night: Cyber Squad-Idle RPG - https://bstk.me/kMU9OnB0A
Guns of Glory: The Iron Mask - https://bstk.me/t8Lm08vQI
King of Avalon: Dominion - https://bstk.me/myTdRdcjK
